response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its high value and importance to you, I propose a special introductory price of $11,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible deal while still allowing me to fairly compensate for the product's worth. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can collaborate on this valuable opportunity.", "product_price": 11000}
